website_summaries.verdict: This model looks great, is easy to clean, and the genuine Astroturf scraper blades need just a few brushes to remove most grass and mud from shoes.
pros: Comes in four sizes and six different colors, making it easy to match the decor of most homes
We love the Astroturf scraper blades, which are great at removing a lot of material from shoes quickly
Durable enough to withstand high traffic areas
Simple cleanup is another great feature on this mat
Mat can be sprayed with a garden hose without risk to the material
cons: This model does better with trapping grass and mud than trapping water, which may pool in the mat, especially in areas with high amounts of snowfall

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: This may is not meant for outdoors. We put it outside on our porch in front of our door - it blows away if it’s even slightly windy because it has no weight to it. Would not recommend for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: njamazon7

customer_reviews.title: Best mat EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one (have purchase 6) I got to put up for goats to rub on (they love scratchy things to rub their undercoat off on.... liked it so much we bought one (larger size) for door entrances...work better than ordinary mats for catching debris before it enters the hose and clean up is a breeze! For a really treat walk on one barefoot...our 6 year old grandson was the first to experience the fabulous foot massage. He exclaimed....”oh Grandma this is awesome!” So of course I had to try it....WOW...it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: BParsons

customer_reviews.title: great portable door mat
customer_reviews.text: These mats are perfect for camping, RVing or most messy, sandy places. It is light weight, and packs easily. Can even easily be cut to size. I find these mats will clean my messy shoe bottoms better then most mats. They are weather resistant, so water drains off. Used them for years at entrance to my back porch. However they don't last for years, so continue to replace them every two or three years. I prefer the brown and tan colors the best for aesthetic purposes.
customer_reviews.author: dancinsue

customer_reviews.title: Dog wouldn't walk on it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for outside our patio door. We track in stuff when we take our dog out back. However, her tender toes don't like it and she won't walk on it. Also, it wasn't removing all of the debris that falls off of the trees behind us from or shoes. I moved the mat to the entry from the garage into the laundry room. I think it will serve better there. I've ordered a regular mat for the patio door.
customer_reviews.author: Susan ReavesTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to put this door mat at a door that you BARELY use, Don't waste your mone buying this one. The best door mat is also made by GraddWorx, but is designed for "high traffic doors." Yes, this one is more than twice the price, but it will last much, much longer than this door mat.
customer_reviews.author: akahemi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DOOR MAT
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this for years, local stores don't carry, We have had many other door mats over the years and none compare!!!! they hold so much sand and stuff. so easy to shake out in a matter of seconds there clean again. Hosing them off a breeze, Thank you for making these available to purchase! will be buying 3 more soon. Old school product surpasses currant door mats in a heart beat! LOVE THESE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia to the Max!
customer_reviews.text: I recalled this mat that I feel like EVERY 80s kid had at their back door growing up, and it took me a while to find one, but this is it! I have three brick steps at my back door, and I actually cut this mat in half longways so that there was "turf" on the middle step and turf plus the flower at the top step. Not only is this mat just like the one from my childhood, but it's great to clean off bare feet before coming inside. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Edges curl up
customer_reviews.text: Edges curl up and make a tripping hazard. not horribly., but more than I want my 84 year old mother walking across. Update... EDGES CURL HORRIBLY! It just goes from bad to worse, My mom would put rocks (like 3 and 4 lb. rocks) to no avail on the edges to prevent curling and still one of her elderly friends tripped on the curled edge. Think twice before you buy it, it is not worth a broken bone. I'd love it if the edges didn't curl, but they do.
customer_reviews.author: Kilowatt

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap like fake plastic grass
customer_reviews.text: It has an industrial look and feel to it and not what I wanted. It may work very well in a high traffic area, but I wanted it as mat outside an exterior all glass door. Besides not looking high end, it doesn't feel nice stepping onto it in bare feet or socks. My dog even hates stepping on it and jumps over it! :) I was looking for a nicer looking product and didn't realize what I had bought.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best doormat ever.
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these for catching cat litter that gets scattered out of the room the boxes are in and all over the house. After putting these in place, there is (seriously) zero litter bits anywhere except for the mat, which is then easily thrown away. I will be ordering more in the future to use t the actual door to the house, if it does such a good job with the heavy traffic litter area, i'm sure it will be a rock star at the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and works fantastic, keeping my floor clean. It’s outside my back Dior and it’s sheltered so won’t blow away but it would definitely blow away if at the front door. My dog won’t walk on it so I just scooted it over a bit. Wish it came in more pleasant colors. This is a definite dark military green.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Astroturf, door mat, attractive door mat
customer_reviews.text: This is real Astroturf which is not available in most retail stores. Available in several sizes & several colors. Not cheap, but more durable than other door mats. No other door mat gets your shoes & boots as clean, preventing dirt from being tracked into your house.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Trip hazard - edge curl
customer_reviews.text: Very dangerous trip hazard. Edges curl up catching against shoe soles in passing. Bought two, one indoor, one outdoor. Both did the same within a couple weeks. Backing much thinner and more flexible than similar but trouble-free products we have on site. Price is right but use with care.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dyal

customer_reviews.title: Like the ones they used to have at stores
customer_reviews.text: We always had one of these. Can't find them in stores anymore. They work better for getting wet grass and dirt off your feet (we live on a farm). These work better than the flat ones that are currently in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Astro turf that cleans shoes well outside the ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it is too pricey for what it is. But it is as advertised and just what I expected. Good quality Astro turf that cleans shoes well outside the entry to my RV. Just like my last one which lasted about 4 years. To keep them from blowing away: I poke 2 small holes on each side and attach with thin wire 2 flat anodized metal straps from the hardware section at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: scottfree

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These mats are impossible to find in my local stores anymore, so I was happy to find these on Amazon. The price is excellent and the size is perfect for what I need. Have bookmarked to purchase again in the future. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Frady

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as it looks on the pic with the little daisy. My roommate has been telling the delivery guys to "keep off the grass" as a joke. Works great as a shoe scraper and keeps our apartment less gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It's both charming and well made.
customer_reviews.text: It's what I wanted for my patio - designed to work well in a garden setting. Daisy and all. It's fairly new, but I expect it will wear well. Appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Best value and cleans the worst dirt and mud off shoes
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY type of doormat I will use. Easy to clean too. You can’t compare the usefulness of this doormat to the straw type. I’ll never waste money on those if I want clean shoes in my house.
customer_reviews.author: cantno

customer_reviews.title: Wipe Your Feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats. They are plastic so the rain does not effect it. Does a great job at cleaning your feet or shoes. Light weight and easy to clean. Have owed many of these.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn McClymont

customer_reviews.title: Don't Come Inside the House Until You Wipe Your Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Best doormat to clean the bottom of your shoes off if your wife is a stickler about her clean floors. And my wife is fastidious about the cleanliness of her home.
customer_reviews.author: speycast4steelhead

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! - Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome! I use it to trap litter in front of the box and I’m fostering cats... their bathroom behaviors are a serious gamble. This rug really helps me spend less time sweeping and vacuuming EVERY DAY. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Morales

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured - what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cute little mat to use as the doormat for our tent on a camping trip. It scraped all the dirt right off our shoes and at the end of out trip, we just shook it out and packed it up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sushi_Grrl

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mat we’ve ever purchased! It was shipped November 29th so probably rec’d it around 1st of December and it has already split into many pieces. Very, very poor quality. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty's Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Light Material
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that the mat was made of such a light material, that any wind blows it away. Not worth any money because it won't be available to function.
customer_reviews.author: NKM

customer_reviews.title: Really great for getting all the mud and dirt out before ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG you have to get one of these!!!!!! They are the bomb!!!!!! Really great for getting all the mud and dirt out before entering your house! I grew up with these and the sweet lil daisy in the corner takes me back to my childhood years!!!!! Great product!!! ENJOY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari L Vennes

customer_reviews.title: Keeps floors clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat for catching leaves and debris from outdoors. My dogs used to drag in leaves and mulch when I let them out on the patio and now this mat traps everything from their paws before they bring it inside. Must have for clean floors!!
customer_reviews.author: sara k

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it at steps that are under my carport so it is not subjected to sun or rain. Have always loved these mats because they clean your shoes so well but can't find them in local stores anymore. So glad I checked for them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this doormat. It is easy to keep clean and I believe it will be very durable. I have another doormat of this same material that I purchased several years ago and I am still using it. The color has stayed about the same and the mat is as serviceable as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McMullin

customer_reviews.title: great mat but size issue
customer_reviews.text: I have some of these same mats I purchased at a store last year. Ordered this one to go under cat litter box, expecting the same size as what I have. But it is smaller and more square in shape. Still a great mat and will use for the entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee J.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans feet and easy to shake dirt out
customer_reviews.text: This works GREAT, really cleans feet and when it's time to pack up all the trapped dirt shakes right out. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RussMc

customer_reviews.title: Liiike it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this ...the color is a lovely green that is not fake astro turf green...it is a lovely mixture that is quite complimentary to today's modern decor
customer_reviews.author: ubiubi

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived with two stripes
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning sand off flip flops at beach house. Dries quickly after rain. Other mats (especially coco-mats) would retain water and stain ground beneath. But why did mine arrive with two black stripes? Would prefer plain (as pictured in Amazon's product description).
customer_reviews.author: P. J. D.

customer_reviews.title: The Dirt Trapper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! You just shake the dirt out when necessary. You can also take the hose to it to do a better cleaning. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lildeb56

customer_reviews.title: Best door mat ever!
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone purchase a different kind of door mat? These mats actually clean the bottom of your shoes! The weight of the material is good, and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the back porch.
customer_reviews.text: I have this off my back door outside, so far I really like it. Will see how it wears in all types of weather and how much it fades over time. I am very happy with my purchase thus far no complaints. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sand out of RV
customer_reviews.text: I added this mat to my RV doorstep. We always track in dirt, sand and pebbles and this has been a great way to prevent tracking all of that crud into the RV. I just glued it to the top of the step and off we went.
customer_reviews.author: Not you

customer_reviews.title: ... it gets plenty of traffic & is holding up nicely! A very convient easy shake out when needed ...
customer_reviews.text: A lovely muted green color this doormat I have placed in my home but it gets plenty of traffic & is holding up nicely! A very convient easy shake out when needed & from time to time I vacuum right over it! A good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the mat for a few days, but I have put it through the ringer. Looks well made and stays in place even in the windy area I live in.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great Doormat - Lite weight and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Best light weight carpet for getting dirt off shoes. I use it in front of the entrance to my camper and it keeps so much dirt out of the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good quality. These work great for the outdoors to keep dust and dirt from coming into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Marbear

customer_reviews.title: Daisy's door
customer_reviews.text: It's for my dog Daisy's door. Wish there was a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Home.12277

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color and well made
customer_reviews.text: I like these mats which keep me from tracking dirt into my small apartment. Wasn't sure about the green color but it's lovely. Appear to be good quality mats.
customer_reviews.author: L&C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of work.
customer_reviews.text: A nice patch of artificial turf with a cute little daisy to put before your entry, what more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: John Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little entry mat for a beach house. Prevents excess sand from entering.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Nixon

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by how much dirt this holds. I use it outside the door of my camper.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Pettinelli

customer_reviews.title: Put It in front of your cat’s litter box
customer_reviews.text: I use these next to the cat litter box. Catches 99% of otherwise scattered litter.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Virtually eliminated tree matter from getting tracked inside
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I have little twiggy things and leaves that fall from a tree outside my front door, that always get tracked inside. This mat has nearly eliminated the problem.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieInNC

customer_reviews.title: Keep you house clean!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great rug for entrance when you want to clean the bottom of your shoes, my little Maltese dog stepped on and and it hurt her feet. Not for dog entrance. Do like it though!!
customer_reviews.author: marleen musilli

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Better then any door mat I have found at the store. Would reccomend to anyone with wood floors or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight, cleans dirt and debris from shoes easily. When it gets dirty Just give it a shake and rinse off with a hose since it is made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: MillsbD

customer_reviews.title: Great doormat
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I was expecting, more sturdy than the ones I bought locally and wore out. Will be purchasing another one soon.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This mat is not fancy but it really cleans your feet and at a great price👍🏻👍🏻

customer_reviews.title: lots of different uses
customer_reviews.text: other than using it for an outdoor mat, I found it useful for my model railroading in simulating early corn fields.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my back door to catch dirt before being tracked into my house. For the price, it works well. Also, it does not curl up on the corners like most of these outdoor rugs do.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: These work really great and are weather proof
customer_reviews.text: Using these at our cottage on the lake to catch more sand before coming inside. These work really great and are weather proof, dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorBoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded our expectations. Holds a ton of dirt, scrapes shoes clean. Everyone should have one at every entrance.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: It is made of cheap materials. It’s too expensive for $15. But it does its purspose.

customer_reviews.title: cleans shoes, doesnt seem to attract alot of dog hair. However slides easily on my  mat tile floor
customer_reviews.text: Nice Brown color, cleans shoes, doesnt seem to attract alot of dog hair. However slides easily on my mat tile floor

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use in nesting boxes for chickens. I was able to cut them up with ease. They were of great quality.

customer_reviews.title: good outside mat
customer_reviews.text: Remember when these used to be less than 3 dollars. Still, it's good for getting off dirt before entering the house.

customer_reviews.text: Will use as overland door mat. Flexible easily rolls for compact storage. Tough material and quality appearance.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cut it in 3 pieces and attached it to the steps of my truck with a zip tie. Works pretty well so far.

customer_reviews.title: very effective
customer_reviews.text: Really does the job keeping sand and dirt out of the camper. I abuse the crap out of it even cleaning my boot while wearing my crampons!

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d shopped around a bit more before I bought
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy a replacement for my new mat. :-(

customer_reviews.title: bought this for outside our RV
customer_reviews.text: and it is fantastic - I'm betting we'll be using it for years!

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This mat is heavy duty, strays put, and works well

customer_reviews.title: Nahhh
customer_reviews.text: It’s no more powerful than the highest setting on my regular hose nozzle. I do like the fan tip because it’s wider than my regular nozzle
customer_reviews.author: C. jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep outside the steps into our pool so we could avoid tracking grass or other debris into the pool. It withstood the summer heat, never got too hot to step on, and has served its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie PJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Cute with daisy in corner. Soft enough to walk barefoot on for my toddlers but firm enough to scrape shoes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Collin W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This mat catches a lot of dirt, but just looks and feels cheap to me. I don't think I would purchase it again, but would look for something that has a nicer quality to it.
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Just like Grandma used to have!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how I remember my grandmother's! Works exactly what I need it for, I bought another one! Very tough and durable; easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: It's the first step!
customer_reviews.text: Our RV has 3 steps and I wanted a good shoe tread scraper on the first step. We put carpet type step rugs on the next 2 steps. The RV steps close just fine. It looks as though this set up will do the job and help keep dirt out of the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Faith H.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SIX AND THEY ARE SO WORTH THE MONEY.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mats for my Voltswagon Beetle and they look super cute with my daisy flower vase .. I added a ladybug to the daisy and it’s super darn cute! They are good quality and you won’t be disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Black grass doormat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for keeping the grass and mud out of my RV. Loved it so much I had to order a second one because my first one got caught up in the lawn mower! :-)

customer_reviews.title: stays wet
customer_reviews.text: it does get the mud off my boots but never dries out. the drainage system does not work well.

customer_reviews.title: Not too plastic looking...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty mat...thick but not cumbersome. Seems to catch most of the garage dirt on our shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Nice welcome mat.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my sister. My sister like it.

customer_reviews.text: I like the mat fine, but it's a little squishy and my two cats won't walk on it. They jump over it going inside and outside. It's been a month or two, so maybe they will eventually get used to it.

customer_reviews.text: This item is great for cleaning off your shoe bottoms, and hard to find in local stores, especially in color choices. Well made, we expect it to last a long time outside our garage entry door..

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these mats, I purchased three of them for each of the doors on my porch. I've had them for a couple months now, they get lots of traffic, especially with two dogs going in and out, and they still look brand new. Easy to clean and unlike some other mats I've had these stay put. They go with the colors on my porch, are reasonably priced and overall a good purchase for me.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job

customer_reviews.title: Good item for price and size.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and size! We actually bought it for a goat scratching post for a local animal sanctuary. She said they love it!

customer_reviews.text: the mat is great except the flower part fell off after a couple of days (without any harsh usage) so don't expect that piece to last.

customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this product works as a doormat, we bought this for our dog that loves to rub and roll around. She loves using it as a scratching mat.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Walton

product_meta.title: GrassWorx Clean Machine Flair Doormat, 18" x 30", Flint (10372029)
product_meta.description: Color:Flint| Size:18" x 30"The hardest working doormats in the world! Clean Machine branded doormats are exclusively made with genuine AstroTurf scraper blades which have been keeping homes clean for over 50 years. Trap dirt, snow, sand, grass & mud before you track it into your home. This Flair doormat, 18" X 30", in Flint utilizes the scientific cleaning breakthrough mimicking the natural cleaning power of grass. These genuine AstroTurf scraper doormats are made from flexible, yet durable polyethylene. The patented manufacturing process creates a grid pattern of thousands of small plastic blades that provide an unparalleled cleaning surface that scrapes shoes clean... cleaner, in fact, than any other doormat. Great for any door. The average 18" x 30" mat holds/hides 1 pound of dirt per week.
